chess

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a standard chess board, which is populated by numerous spaces from the Space class.
    Author:
    Michael Allen, Ziad Bekhiet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new instance of board, and sets up the chess board format

      Checks for check for white

      • getSpace

        public Space getSpace(int row,
                      int col)
        Returns a space of the board given the row and column
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the space to be returned
        col - the column of the space to be returned
        Returns:
        the space at (row, col)

        public ChessPiece getPiece(java.lang.String boardCoords)
        returns the piece on a board given a string of rowcol
        Parameters:
        boardCoords - a string that represents the coordinates of the space
        Returns:
        the piece on the space

        Checks for check for white
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        1 or 0, 0 if not in check
